posts.post_title: WTB 14 low grade Red Cobbs with the following backs...
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy the following low grade red cobbs PSA or SGC graded (1 to 2 preferred):

  * SC 350 Fact 25
  * SC 350 Fact 30
  * SC 460 Fact 25
  * SC 460 Fact 30
  * SC 460 Fact 42 with OP
  * Pied 350
  * Pied 460 Fact 25
  * Pied 460 Fact 42
  * Polar Bear
  * Old Mill
  * Tolstoi
  * Cycle 350 (interested in any grade)
  * EPDG (interested in any grade)
  * Carolina Brights (interested in any grade)


Please email me or PM me if you have one for sale.
